properties.description: An arcade remake of the classic top down shooter 1942. Take your trusty Yellow Thunder on an adventure just like in the old times! Or team up with a friend, and top the high-score. Show them who the best pilot is!
properties.author: Zen Masters

stringProperties.name: placeholder
stringProperties.value: Enter your name for the high score!

events.comment: These work in conjunction with "TopDownMovement" behavior

description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
There are ready-to-use resource bars in the asset-store [resource bars pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=resource-bars-resource-bars).

events.comment: This allows to detect a change of "intial value" on hot reload.
Create the label over the bar.
Pass the configuration to the behavior.

Children instances must be resized when the parent size change:
- background is resized to take the full dimensions of the parent
- the bar size is refreshed according to the value
- the label is put back at the center of the bar

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.

eventsFunctions.description: Center the bar according to the button configuration. This is used in doStepPostEvents when the button is resized.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: FireBullet
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Fire bullets, manage ammo, reloading, and overheating.
description: Fire bullets, manage ammo, reloading, and overheating.
Firing bullets:
- Cooldown: Time between shots (seconds)
- Bullet Quantity: Number of bullets created each time Fire Bullet action is used.
- Firing Arc: Range of angles (in degrees) that bullets will shoot. Bullets are evenly spread within this range.
- Rotate bullet: Change the angle of each bullet to match the direction it is travelling (enabled by default)
- Angle Variance: Each bullet trajectory will be adjusted by a random value within this range (degrees)
- Bullet speed variance: Each bullet speed will be adjusted by a random value within this range (pixels/second)
Ammo:
- Starting ammo
- Max ammo
- Shots per reload. Use 0 to disable reloading
- Reload duration
- Automatic reloading is enabled by default, but it can also be done manually.
Overheat:
- Heat increase per shot. Object is Overheated when Heat reaches  1.
- Cooling rate per second
- When overheated, the object cannot fire any bullets
Statistics:
- Total bullets created
- Total shots taken
- Total reloads completed

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Fire bullets, manage ammo, reloading, and overheating.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FireBullet

events.comment: Creators can use the "FireBullet" action multiple times in a frame and it will be counted as a single "shot".
Subtract 1 from ammo (if not unlimited ammo)
Only reload the amount of ammo available

events.name: Reduce heat level (based on cooling rate)
